ModMetaData.name: More Royal Rid
ModMetaData.author: Shadowrabbit
ModMetaData.description:
More Royal Rid ID:2028481893 Author:Shadowrabbit Support Version: 1.2 Support Languages:简体中文(Chinese),English,日本語(Japanese). Github:https://github.com/Shadowrabbit/SR_MoreRoyalAid Describtion: It adds more aids for royal.Favor will be more useful.
添加了更多种类的皇家支援。声望会变得更有用。
ロイヤル支援の追加。王の寵愛がもっと役立つます。
